version_description:
Fixed crashes on iPhone 5S, 6, 6 Plus; iPad Air, Mini 2, 3; iPod Touch 6th gen.
Available rewards increased majorly (battlecoins, rating and chest keys).
Items drop rate from chests is also increased (prepare to get some guns, lots of guns)
Interface got improved and doesn’t look like developer’s art now (we hope).
So it seems that we did a great job for you guys to get more fun playing Battle Prime.

A NEW MODE: HARVEST. Fight your enemies and collect tokens to win.
Open spaces and many shelters—the new Harbor map is perfect for almost any style of playing.
When you perform certain actions in combat, you get their visual confirmation, i.e. combat achievements.
A "Trophy road" has been added. It displays your progress in the rating and corresponding awards for it.
The balancer has been upgraded, shooting has been improved, more awards for prime levels have been added, and much more has updated.

- Battle Pass. Complete missions and earn rewards of the 1st season featuring useful resources, new equipment, and new Prime agent ISOTOPE.
- Ingenious and merciless ISOTOPE joins the fight! Unsurpassed knowledge in nuclear physics and the ability to use it makes him a dangerous opponent.
- Team up with your friends in squads and fight shoulder-to-shoulder against a common enemy.
- Two new maps. Ambush careless opponents in the thicket of the Forest and compete on the territory of the abandoned Bunker.
- Improved interface, optimization, and in-game balance.

- Season 2 Battle Pass: new missions and rewards are waiting for you.
- THUNDER — new Prime Agent joins the fight.
- SKINS! It’s time to customize your heroes and stand out in battle.
- New game mode Control and map Skyrise.
- Language selection setting was added.
- Joystick control was improved.
- Improved interface, optimization, and in-game balance.

- 60 FPS unlocked.
- Improved controls and aiming mechanic.
- Gameplay improvements and optimizations.
- Various connection issues resolved.

- Season 3 Battle Pass: new missions and rewards are waiting for you.
- Gyroscope and ragdoll-animations.
- Leaderboard — the official rating of the best Battle Prime players.
- Squads up to 6 players.
- New skins for Primes. Get them and stand out in battle.
- Extended in-game settings.
- Improved interface, gameplay, and in-game balance
- Various bug fixes and optimizations.

- Season 3 continues! Complete Battle Pass missions and earn cool rewards.
- Squads up to 3 players.
- Improved gameplay and in-game balance.
- Various bug fixes and optimizations.

Welcome to Season 4!
The new update includes:
- Two Battle Passes and plenty of cool rewards.
- Daily Login Bonus.
- Exciting in-game events with valuable prizes.
- New futuristic CyberCity map.
- Fast-paced battles 3 on 3 in new game mode Skirmish.
- Brand new skins for Primes and weapons.
- Clans, squad chat and other gameplay improvements.

- Season 4 continues! Complete Battle Pass missions and earn cool rewards.
- Improved interface.
- Improved in-game balance.
- Various bug fixes and optimizations.

- Season 4 continues! Complete Battle Pass missions and earn cool rewards.
- Improved in-game balance and gameplay.
- Various bug fixes and optimizations.

- Join the “Karakurt” Operation. Complete new Battle Pass missions and grab cool rewards!
- New Battle Modes, including Sabotage, Duel, 6v6 Gun-Fu & Sniper Arena.
- Custom Battles: create matches with their own rules and invite friends to battle.
- Quick Orders for better coordination with your team.
- Brand new skins for Primes and weapons.
- Interface and gameplay improvements.
- Various bug fixes and optimizations.

- Join the “Karakurt” Operation. Complete new Battle Pass missions and grab cool rewards!
- Various bug fixes and optimizations.

- Join the “Thunderbird” Operation. Play, level up Battle Pass, and earn rewards!
- JUMPER and GLITCH — 2 new Primes join the fight.
- Reworked progression system, as well as all-new upgrades for Primes and Weapons.
- Referral program: invite your friends and receive more prizes.
- New Battle Mode GUNPLAY.
- More cool skins for Primes and weapons.
- Interface and gameplay improvements.
- Various bug fixes and optimizations.

- Winter Chronicles Battle Pass. Join the festive fun – new cool rewards are waiting for you.
- The 2nd competitive Battle Prime season. Fight, increase your rating, and receive prizes.
- XP Cards. Use them to level up your Primes and arsenal faster.
- New skins, emotes, and avatars.
- Various bug fixes and optimizations.

- Operation Phoenix Battle Pass – new rewards are waiting for you!
- The 3rd competitive season. Fight and receive prizes.
- XP Booster: earn more XP for each battle.
- Enhanced friends and squads systems.
- New skins, emotes, and avatars.
- Interface and gameplay improvements.
- Various bug fixes and optimizations.

- Dark Zone Battle Pass: battle, level up and earn exclusive rewards.
- Competitive Season IV. Join rating battles and get prizes.
- Piggy Bank: fight and fill your piggy bank with resources.
- New skins, holograms, avatars, and avatar frames.
- Interface and gameplay improvements.
- Various bug fixes and optimizations.
